# tbls50x30 <img src='man/figures/logo.png' align="right" height="139" />

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of tbls50x30 is to create display tables for monitoring 50x30 surveys.

## Installation

You can install the development version of tbls50x30 like so:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("arthur-shaw/tbls50x30")
```
